security: Revealing that the CIA is running traces on individuals (Stoliakov and Alfiriev) could compromise ongoing intelligence operations and alert the individuals to the agency's interest in them. Quoting: "NO PRELIM TRACES STOLIAKOV AND ALFIRIEV. ADDITIONAL HAS TRACES WILL BE RUN AND RESULTS FORWARDED."
summary: A classified message indicating that preliminary traces on Stoliakov and Alfiriev have been initiated, with additional traces to be run and results forwarded.
summary_one_paragraph: This *SECRET* classified message, dated September 26, 1958, from the Director to Buenos Aires [BURN] [6-29], indicates that preliminary traces on individuals named Stoliakov and Alfiriev have been initiated but yielded no results yet; additional traces are scheduled to be run, and the results are to be forwarded, referencing the earlier communication RB (BUEN) 3501 (IN 44771) and citing DIR OUT77287 77887 43097.
title: Traces on Stoliakov and Alfiriev
